alert.note: Alert for Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 3:59PM EDT until June 14 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WILCOX AND SOUTHEASTERN CRISP COUNTIES... At 359 PM EDT, a confirmed tornado was located near Ashburn, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Rochelle, Arabi, Double Run, Antioch Church and Owensboro. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
